home.title: Hi! Welcome to my portfolio üòä
home.description: I'm Carmee, a full-stack developer with a strong passion for technology and creativity. This place is where I share my projects and everything that motivates me to keep learning and growing in the world of programming. My goal is to show you what I‚Äôm capable of and, through my projects, convey the innovation and attention to detail that define me. I hope you enjoy exploring my work!

sobreMi.title: About Me
sobreMi.subtitle: From Laboratory Precision to Code Functionality
sobreMi.paragraph1: I'm a Full-Stack developer specialized in building robust user interfaces with React and efficient APIs with Node.js. After completing the intensive Adalab Bootcamp, I am ready to apply my skills in a professional environment.
sobreMi.paragraph2: My previous experience as a Laboratory Technician provided me with invaluable foundations in methodology, thorough analysis, and rigor, skills I now directly apply to debugging code and project architecture. This career change is driven by my passion for solving complex problems and the functional creativity that web development offers.
sobreMi.paragraph3: I‚Äôm looking for a team that values precision and adaptability. My goal is to contribute to projects that make a difference.
sobreMi.personalInterests: When I‚Äôm not coding, I keep my mind active with my hobbies: watching anime, playing video games, and dancing. I also go to the gym every day, a place where, curiously, unexpected coding solutions often come to mind!

purrSkills.title: Purr Skills
purrSkills.description: Character sheet generator for RPG games, with dynamic point calculation functions. Team project where I took on leadership and design.

rickMortyApi.title: Rick & Morty API Search
rickMortyApi.description: Personal application for searching and filtering characters from the series, using a public API. Demonstrates handling of asynchronous data and state management with Hooks.

animeApiBackend.title: Anime API (Backend)
animeApiBackend.description: Backend project implementing a database with animes and their characters. Demonstrates knowledge of MERN/MEVN architecture (depending on technologies used) and CRUD management.

formacion.title: Education
formacion.descripcio: Practical and immersive training with a focus on the full web development cycle. Based on real projects, teamwork, and agile methodologies (Scrum).
